titles.title: Providing for the attendance of the House at the Inaugural Ceremonies of the President and Vice President of the United States.
Providing for the attendance of the House at the Inaugural Ceremonies of the President and Vice President of the United States.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

term.name: Presidents and presidential powers, Vice Presidents

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Requires: (1) at 10:30 a.m. on Monday, January 21, 2013, the House to proceed to the West Front of the Capitol to attend the inaugural ceremonies of the President and Vice President of the United States; and (2) upon the conclusion of the ceremonies, the House to adjourn until 10 a.m. on Tuesday, January 22, 2013.
